resources.string: Harvest House international church ,otherwise popularly known as HHI.Church is a vibrant fast growing charismatic church founded in 1995 by Bishop Dr Colin Nyathi and Senior Reverend Dr Sarah Nyathi.From a first service of less than ten people in their living room in the city of Bulawayo in Zimbabwe in 1995,this church has grown to more than 6000 in attendance on a single Sunday service
